name: Trial of the Tennis-Lord
description:
An endless platforming arena where you battle hordes of robots with nothing but your trusty racket and ball. This game was made for the 2020 Mix and Game Jam, and mixes the genres of sport and platformer.

Controls:

WSAD or Arrow Keys to move

Left mouse button to hit the ball (it heads towards your mouse)

Right mouse button to slow time (this is only possible when near the ball)

Double jump is enabled, have fun :)

Music: BoxCat Games - Inspiration. Licensed under Attribution 3.0 Unported https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nd/3.0/legalcode
